snippet: Two former employees of Strategic Allied Consulting, a company once hired by the Republican Party of Florida, admitted that they forged voter registration forms.
abstract: Two former employees of Strategic Allied Consulting, company once hired by Republican Party of Florida, are charged with third-degree felony after admitting to forging voter registration forms
lead_paragraph: Two former employees of Strategic Allied Consulting, a company once hired by the Republican Party of Florida, admitted that they forged voter registration forms.
